transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, ha mai bol rahi hu kaise hai?
Customer: IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu Parvez ka senior.
Executive: Mene na call kiya call kiya tha hamare aapke incoming call aayi thi Parvez ke number pe.
Customer: Ha mai know.
Customer: Mene call kiya to category kuch delete marne to iske liye kal mene call kiya tha unko.
Executive: Achha category delete marne ke liye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Waha pe mar diya? Kar liya aapne?
Customer: Nahi mar diya kyuki mujhe nahi samajh raha tha iske mene kal call kara tha par wo call nahi utha rahe the.
Executive: Achha wo kal chutti thi na hamari isliye nahi utha rahe honge.
Customer: To kon kon si category aap hatana chah rahe hai?
Customer: Hand pallet apna hand trolley ka jo Parvez ne hi bola tha mujhe ki uska ticket open ho gaya hai aisa waisa kuch baat kara tha wo.
Executive: Nahi nahi hand trolley se related hai.
Customer: Hand trolley hand trolley.
Customer: Achha abhi mai deal nahi karta par wo category add hai isko isliye.
Executive: Achha ab nahi karte.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sorry guys.
Customer: Dekhiye mai bata raha hu kon kon sa added hai sun lijiye, thik hai.
Customer: Industrial vacuum cleaner added hai, thik hai, okay hai ye?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Okay, wet wet dry vacuum cleaner.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: A scissor lift.
Customer: Yes scissor lift.
Customer: Good goods lift.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Hydraulic lift.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Hydraulic good lift.
Executive: Right.
Customer: Material handling lift.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Battery attacker.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Bas yahi hai baki kuch nahi hai, thik hai.
Executive: Hand trolley aapne usme hand trolley nahi hai na?
Customer: Nahi hai.
Executive: Material handling trolley.
Customer: Material handling lift hai trolley nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm trolley konsa bhi nahi hai na usme category me?
Customer: Ha ha nahi trolley nahi hai isme sir.
Executive: Ha fir rehne do fir thik hai chalo.
Executive: Okay no problem. Ha thik hai, thik hai to mai isko close kar raha hu ek feedback de dijiyega thik hai, thik hai thank you no problem okay. Ha hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove hand trolley category.

- Wants to confirm the list of added categories.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the list of added categories.

- Executive confirmed hand trolley is not in the list.

- Executive offered to close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive requested feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- category, delete, hand trolley, feedback
